channel.title: Need Help! (BADLY)
channel.description:
[code] ^ client.java:502: class, interface, or enum expected int pickTime = 20; ^ client.java:503: class, interface, or enum expected int oreType = 0; ^ client.java:504: class, interface, or enum expected boolean carryOver = true; ^ client.java:505: class, interface, or enum expected int oreXP = 17; ^ client.java:506: class, interface, or enum expected int miningTimer = 0; ^ client.java:507: class, interface, or enum expected int numRocks = 0; ^ client.java:508: class, interface, or enum expected int[] rockX = new int[999]; ^ client.java:509: class, interface, or enum expected int[] rockY = new int[999]; ^ client.java:510: class, interface, or enum expected int[] rockID = new int[999]; ^ client.java:511: class, interface, or enum expected int[] rockSP = new int[999]; ^ client.java:512: class, interface, or enum expected boolean actionMining = false; ^ client.java:513: class, interface, or enum expected public int rangeIndex = -1; ^ client.java:515: class, interface, or enum expected public void DeleteArrow() ^ client.java:520: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:523: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(1688); ^ client.java:524: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(playerArrows); ^ client.java:525: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(playerEquipment[playerArrows]+1); ^ client.java:526: class, interface, or enum expected if (playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1 > 254) { ^ client.java:528: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeDWord(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1); ^ client.java:529: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:532: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:534: class, interface, or enum expected playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -= 1; ^ client.java:535: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:537: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:538: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:539: class, interface, or enum expected public int HitCalc() ^ client.java:543: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 20) ^ client.java:545: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 30) ^ client.java:547: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 40) ^ client.java:549: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 50) ^ client.java:551: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 60) ^ client.java:553: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 70) ^ client.java:555: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 80) ^ client.java:557: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 90) ^ client.java:559: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 100) ^ client.java:561: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 110) ^ client.java:563: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 120) ^ client.java:565: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerLevel[4] <= 130) ^ client.java:567: class, interface, or enum expected else ^ client.java:569: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:570: class, interface, or enum expected public void animation(int id, int Y, int X) ^ client.java:573: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); ^ client.java:574: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); ^ client.java:575: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.createFrame(4); ^ client.java:576: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(0); ^ client.java:577: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(id); ^ client.java:578: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(0); ^ client.java:579: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(0); ^ client.java:580: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:581: class, interface, or enum expected public int EnemyIndexP = -1; //Wolf: Kept at -1 for default, will change to curr ent enemy when projectile is fired ^ client.java:582: class, interface, or enum expected public void fire1(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) { //Credits -fedexer- ^ client.java:586: class, interface, or enum expected if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "n ull")){ ^ client.java:589: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:594: class, interface, or enum expected public void stillgfx4(int id, int Y, int X) ^ client.java:597: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); ^ client.java:598: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); ^ client.java:599: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.createFrame(4); ^ client.java:600: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7) ^ client.java:601: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id ^ client.java:602: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(80);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i think it 's written in pixels 100 pixels higher ^ client.java:603: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic ^ client.java:604: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:605: class, interface, or enum expected public void DropArrows() { ^ client.java:607: class, interface, or enum expected int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; ^ client.java:608: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) ^ client.java:611: class, interface, or enum expected } else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) { ^ client.java:613: class, interface, or enum expected ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, Enemy Y, amount); ^ client.java:614: class, interface, or enum expected ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false); ^ client.java:615: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:617: class, interface, or enum expected public void DropArrowsNPC() { ^ client.java:619: class, interface, or enum expected int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; ^ client.java:620: class, interface, or enum expected if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) ^ client.java:623: class, interface, or enum expected } else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) { ^ client.java:625: class, interface, or enum expected ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, Enemy Y, amount); ^ client.java:626: class, interface, or enum expected ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false); ^ client.java:627: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:629: class, interface, or enum expected public int specBar = 10; ^ client.java:630: class, interface, or enum expected public void ConvertMagic() { ^ client.java:632: class, interface, or enum expected NpcDialogueSend = false; ^ client.java:633: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(435, absY, absX); ^ client.java:634: class, interface, or enum expected RemoveAllWindows(); ^ client.java:635: class, interface, or enum expected if (ancients == 1) { ^ client.java:637: class, interface, or enum expected ancients = 0; ^ client.java:638: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("The dark mage converts back to normal magic!"); ^ client.java:639: class, interface, or enum expected } else { ^ client.java:641: class, interface, or enum expected ancients = 1; ^ client.java:642: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("The dark mage converts you to ancient magicks!"); ^ client.java:643: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:645: class, interface, or enum expected public void animation3(int id, int Y, int X) //ANIMATIONS AT MIDDLE HEIGHT ^ client.java:652: class, interface, or enum expected if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) ^ client.java:657: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:664: class, interface, or enum expected public void animation2(int id, int Y, int X) //ANIMATIONS AT GROUND HEIGHT ^ client.java:667: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); ^ client.java:668: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); ^ client.java:669: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.createFrame(4); ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
NO IDEA. Haven't even touched that area of coding. Any help would be greatly appreciated?
